title: The nevv heresie of the Jesuits publickly maintain'd at Paris in the Colledge of Clermont, by conclusions, printed 12 Decemb., 1661, denounced to all the bishops of France / translated out of the French original.
author: Arnauld, Antoine, 1612-1694.
notes: Translation of: Nouvelle hérésie des Jésuites.
Attributed to Antoine Arnauld. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
